creator: rich@steelezone.net
text:
Created attachment 31052
Patch file

Based on discussion about bug 42702 (see https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=42702#c10) I've created a patch that allows a <filterset> to accept one or more <propertyset> nested elements to use as the source of token values.

svn revision 1548210

I've converted your test to an AntUnit test just because I like it better :-)

The only other change I've made is to assume less about the types contained within the propertyset - even though they most probably will always be strings.

Thanks!
creator: bodewig@apache.org
rich@steelezone.net
text: I've confirmed the enhancement works as I expect after building latest from source.  Thanks much!
